Text.Page:
Mission Orders

Eliminate the {@LinkCreature:8#1011#hulking sentries}, {@LinkCreature:8#1021#cromos prowlers}, and {@LinkCreature:8#1031#Caprin imps}.

Report to Narisa at the Avenger Outpost when mission is complete.

Done, done, done! Another mission order we can simply wash our hands of!

Please, take this for you contribution to the cause!

Hmm? No, no, no. You carry out the orders, then I give you the reward. That's how it works.

You must be new. No hard feelings. Just get out there.
